data.name: Sample - VMware NSX T - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "VMware NSX T" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Upsert Group
workflows.description: Create/Update a group based on specified fields. If a group with the group-id is not already present then create a new group. If it already exists, update the group.

workflows.name: Get Rule Details
workflows.description: Get details information for specified rule.

arguments.title: VMware NSX T: Get Rule Details

workflows.name: Upsert Rule
workflows.description: Create/Update the rule. If Rule corresponding to the the given rule-id is not present, the object will get created and if it is present it will be updated. This is a full replace.

workflows.name: Add/Remove MAC Addresses
workflows.description: Add or remove the specified MAC Addresses from a given expression of a group.

arguments.title: VMware NSX T: Add/Remove MAC Addresses

routes.name: Start -> Add or Remove MAC Addresses

workflows.name: Get Rules List
workflows.description: Get list of firewall rules from specified policy.

arguments.title: VMware NSX T: Get Rules List

workflows.name: Upsert Security Policy
workflows.description: Create/Update the security policy for a domain. If a security policy for the given security-policy-id is not present, the object will get created and if it is present it will be updated. This is a full replace.

arguments.title: VMware NSX T: Upsert Security Policy

workflows.name: Get Group Details
workflows.description: Get detailed information about specific groups from specific domains.

arguments.title: VMware NSX T: Get Group Details

workflows.name: Delete Security Policy
workflows.description: Delete a security policy from domain along with all the rules.

arguments.title: VMware NSX T: Delete Security Policy

workflows.name: Get Security Policy Details
workflows.description: Get security policy details for a specified domain.

arguments.title: VMWare NSX T: Get Security Policy Details

workflows.name: Get Security Policies List
workflows.description: List all security policies for a domain.

arguments.title: VMware NSX T: Get Security Policies List

workflows.name: Get Groups List
workflows.description: List Groups for a domain. Groups can be filtered using member_types query parameter, which returns the groups that contains the specified member types.

arguments.title: VMware NSX T: Get Groups List

workflows.name: Delete Group
workflows.description: Delete a group for a specified domain.

workflows.name: Add/Remove IP Addresses
workflows.description: Add or remove the specified IP Addresses from a given expression of a group.

arguments.title: VMware NSX T: Add/Remove IP Addresses
